channel.title: Soliyandar on tlake.io

item.title: Soliyandar? More Like "So Long, Yandar!"
item.description: Val communes with the Briarheart, and in a bittersweet and selfless moment, gives Soliyandar to Ffywellyn. Finn finally leads the party to the fey crossing to rendezvous with Willoughby the Whether Gnome, and they patch together a plan of action: ride on the back of Willoughby to the Spring Court, stopping only briefly to gain a new transport via plants location near the Summer Court on the way.
